title: I'm done caring.
body:
Just thought it's fair to warn you that I'm done giving a shit. I'm sick of doing everything right and losing anyway because my teammates just _can't fucking play._ I'm sick of trying hard, only to have my time wasted. I'm sick of being serious and doing my best.

So fuck it all. I don't care any more. I'm just going to do whatever the fuck I like and to hell with the consequences, because there are none. Lose the game? That was going to happen anyway no matter WHAT I do. Get reported? For what, being non-meta? Not giving a fuck makes me LESS toxic, not more, since if I don't care I don't get worked up.

So I'm going to play my Teemo support and my Poppy jungle and my Nami mid if I can get away with that one. And you're going to let me, because you can't do jack-shit about it. And I'm going to do pretty well on them (hey, just because I don't give a fuck doesn't mean I'm not TRYING) and you're going to feed like the noob you are and waste my efforts anyway. And I'm not going to care.

And yes, I'm going to do it in ranked. And there's nothing you can do to stop me. Because I'm not breaking the rules- Riot doesn't mandate that you have to give a fuck. I'm not trolling. I'm playing seriously. I even buy Sightstone first on Teemo support because I'm not a useless retard like most of the supports I get teamed with (I think a 30-minute Sightstone is the record so far, not counting those who never buy one at all because "wards are for faggots"). I just don't care.

Just thought I'd warn you.

replies.body: Out of interest what division in Bronze are you? This sounds like something I'd expect from a very low elo player.

> [{quoted}](name=ESC Static,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=bO8b1NAJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-23T07:01:27.086+0000)
>
> Out of interest what division in Bronze are you? This sounds like something I'd expect from a very low elo player.

"Up you go" {{champion:31}}

Well I WAS in bronze II last night. After 11 games in a row with only ONE that didn't have either an outright feeder or a ragequit/lag out 4v5 loss, I'm now in bronze IV. That is the exact reason I stopped giving a shit.

> [{quoted}](name=ESC Static,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=bO8b1NAJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-23T07:01:27.086+0000)
>
> Out of interest what division in Bronze are you? This sounds like something I'd expect from a very low elo player.

My thoughts exactly

Before commenting i think some things should be addressed " There are people who work hard their entire lives, _**only to die in poverty and squalor. The world isn't that pretty, and LoL is worse**_." "I'm going TO PLAY my _**Teemo support and my Poppy jungle and my Nami mid.**_" and now for my criticism, to get out of bronze try finding a champion to main and get good at **that is in the current meta** second **don't blame your teammates for your losses** try to find ways to improve yourself before blaming others because after all **you're in the worst elo in the game** and do not have the right to blame others. lastly comparing  poverty to a fucking video game is just a terrible thing to do and you should probably get a reality check on issues in the world because i really doubt that a bronze "2" is good at **Nami mid, Poppy jungle, and Teemo support.**

- Regards Kawaii Syndrome: Oceanic 
PS: Quick joke.. Why was {{champion:15}}  kicked out of the spelling bee?
Because she could only spell shield.

Maybe try playing in a ranked team with friends? that way you know how to communicate with your teammates. 
Otherwise, try not playing as an individual.
stop blaming everything else on your team, for {{champion:86}}teed wins.
Get along, a little friendliness and some helpful tips to players that are struggling, go along way
nice pun :P

I know how you feel man, but you have to remember that not everyone is as good as you. I use to play with really bad players, trolls, afkers, feeders. Instead of quitting or giving up, I stuck in there, played as best as I could, and now im playing with platinums and diamonds, and im only silver. Work hard, and you will get rewarded. Good luck

Except, uh, that's not true. There are people who work hard their entire lives, only to die in poverty and squalor. The world isn't that pretty, and LoL is worse.

I mean thanks for the sympathy, but I gave up on that "if you keep trying, eventually you will succeed" bull when I decided I didn't care any more. It's simply not true.

> [{quoted}](name=Arcane Azmadi,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=bO8b1NAJ,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-07-23T06:26:42.497+0000)
>
> 
> So I'm going to play my Teemo support and my Poppy jungle and my Nami mid if I can get away with that one. And you're going to let me, because you can't do jack-shit about it. And I'm going to do pretty well on them (hey, just because I don't give a fuck doesn't mean I'm not TRYING) and you're going to feed like the noob you are and waste my efforts anyway. And I'm not going to care.
> 

Good call, play the game how you want and if people dodge who cares about them. They are only bronze noobs anyways.

Btw wanna duo? , I'm sick of noobs with no strategy also.

And for those people that say "You must be in a low elo to post this"? Well yeah he is **because of noobs**. If you bother to check his stats you can see that he's a reasonble player. I mean 95% of bronzes can't even get a KDA of over 3 on their favourite champ after 100 games. He can. I can understand his frustration.

> If you bother to check his stats you can see that he's a reasonble player. 

Well, looking at his stats he regularly gets less than 100 CS in 20+ minute games and less than 200 CS in 40+ minute games. I can understand ***some*** of those games are support but this is happening pretty much every single game, at least pretty much every game over the past couple months. Sure his K/D/A is regularly good, even brilliant at times, but it's not the only thing that counts.
Yeah he could work on his cs.
You just strait up lied to us all, if you were really "done caring." You wouldn't have made this post in the first place.
k
And why do you think that literally anyone on this forum would give a shit?
Well it means that I won't have to explain this as much to my team at the start of every game. Some people like to know these things.
So you think that every single league of legends player on oce reads these boards, and is going to remember your name?
Yes, stop shitposting
nah

At a low elo game, you have to play carry.

The more you blame your teammates, the more you will lose.
This game is related closely to the players attitude and mindset, not Yolo style skill

Your problem was that you cared in the first place. It's a video game. You're meant to have fun. Don't know why people get so worked up about ranked. It's not really much different to normals. I doubt you get worked up as much about bad team mates when you play a normal, so why for ranked? Just because you want a border and a skin that much? Like honestly, when you queue up it's always a gamble. if you can't handle the possibility of 4 random teammates being bad, then just don't play soloQ.

Anyways, i'v been playing since the beta. 

Have never made gold.
 
Still love the game, have made some great mates from it. Who really cares about what border you get in the end. (Although i might i spose if i went in on and played ranked more). 

I went through the same thing, even missed out on bronze in s1.. (lol). I got to 1248 elo...sigh. the bronze elo was 1250..

I'v had some great players say that you only get better in ranked, so keep playing and don't look at chat so much maybe. (Oh and not give a shi*t).

> I'm done giving a shit

Makes a thread about it...

> Just thought I'd warn you.

What? The 20 or so people who use the boards? What good is that going to do?

I'll just leave this here

https://youtu.be/dqphVLmp_3A?t=1m17s

> [{quoted}](name=Shood,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=bO8b1NAJ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-07-23T08:03:07.059+0000)
>
> I'll just leave this here
> 
> https://youtu.be/dqphVLmp_3A?t=1m17s

I watched that whole clip. Probably gunna watch the film again soon. lol.
